Indian Economy.title: A resilient economy
Indian Economy.summary: Growth, external account boost sovereign rating

Indian Economy.title: Household debt must ease before it constrains demand in India
Indian Economy.summary: A recent flurry of loans taken for consumption rather than asset creation spells a heavy repayment burden borne by households. Incomes must grow faster. Else, debt could weigh on India’s medium-term economic growth.

Indian Economy.title: UP CM launches Samarth Uttar Pradesh campaign to crowdsource ideas for ‘Vision 2047’
Indian Economy.summary: From portal, QR codes and workshops, people to be encouraged to submit suggestions on 12 priority sectors

Indian Economy.title: Mint Quick Edit | India’s services sector seems to be on a roll
Indian Economy.summary: A well-tracked gauge of this sector’s activity suggests strong momentum last month, with export orders rising sharply. Price levels may need to be watched for a well-rounded view.

Indian Economy.title: Yield signal: India’s market for bonds has a mind of its own
Indian Economy.summary: Rising bond yields in India reflect fears that new macroeconomic realities will enlarge the government’s fiscal deficit and increase public borrowing. The Reserve Bank of India should resist the urge to intervene beyond a point.

Stock Market.title: Sensex off day’s high, GST meet in focus; Tata Steel, JSW Steel, SAIL, Jindal Steel lift metals pack
Stock Market.summary: Tata Steel, Coal India led gainers, while Infosys, Axis Bank and Tech Mahindra were top laggards. Manappuram, Yes Bank, Bosch, Indus Towers and more in focus.

Stock Market.title: Nifty Bank Prediction Today – September 3, 2025: Nifty Bank futures: Testing a support
Stock Market.summary: Nifty Bank index fluctuates around 53,760, with public sector banks outperforming private peers; futures may decline below 53,950.

Stock Market.title: Metal stocks power markets higher as GST Council expectations drive rally
Stock Market.summary: The turnaround came after a tepid start to the trading session, with metal stocks leading the charge as Tata Steel emerged as the top gainer, soaring 5.96% to ₹167.83

Stock Market.title: Metal stocks power markets higher as GST Council expectations drive rally

Stock Market.title: Nifty Prediction Today – September 03, 2025: Nifty 50 Futures: Stay out for now. Take fresh shorts on a break below the support
Stock Market.summary: Nifty 50 September Futures contract can fall to 24,480 on a break below 24,600; Take fresh shorts on a break below the support

Startups & Funding.title: As funding momentum returns, startups eye next growth push
Startups & Funding.summary: Series B and C stages of funding are seeing a gradual uptick amid a growth in distribution channels, reduced burn rates, and more rational valuations. Does this signal early signs of revival in the mid-market segment?

Startups & Funding.title: Urban Company sets IPO price band of ₹98-103 per share
Startups & Funding.summary: Its existing shareholders, including domestic private equity firms Accel India and Elevation Capital, will collectively offload shares worth ₹1428 crore 14.28 billion rupees.

Banking & Finance.title: IIT JAM 2026: IIT Bombay to begin registration from Sep 5; dates, how to apply
Banking & Finance.summary: IIT JAM 2026 Registration: As per the notification, for this year, the official website for the IIT JAM 2026 or JOAPS portal is jam2026.iitb.ac.in. The last date for the application is October 12, 2025.

Banking & Finance.title: Expediting loan recovery: Punjab & Haryana HC directs orientation course on SARFAESI Act for DMs and revenue officials
Banking & Finance.summary: This directive may prompt the banking sector’s Self Regulatory Organisation — the Indian Banks’ Association — to take up the decision with all States

Banking & Finance.summary: Rising bond yields in India reflect fears that new macroeconomic realities will enlarge the government’s fiscal deficit and increase public borrowing. The Reserve Bank of India should resist the urge to intervene beyond a point.

Banking & Finance.title: Govt sets up committee to examine tax, export clearance issues of manufacturing sector
Banking & Finance.summary: The committee includes representatives from the finance ministry, Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade (DPIIT), Department of Commerce, Directorate General of Foreign Trade (DGFT), and the RBI

Banking & Finance.title: Bank holiday today: Are banks open or closed on Wednesday, September 3 for Karma Puja? Check here
Banking & Finance.summary: Bank holiday today: On September 3, 2025, banks in Ranchi will closed for Karma Puja, while banks across the country will operate as usual.

Technology Sector.title: Two groups of Indians win $1 million each in Dubai Duty Free draw
Technology Sector.summary: Ettiyanikkal Pailybabu, a 56-year-old from Kerala will share the $1 million with nine of his colleagues, who also contributed to the ticket’s cost of AED 1000 (Rs 24,000).

Technology Sector.title: No prosecution of minorities entering India after 2014: MHA
Technology Sector.summary: The Citizenship Amendment Act-2019 sets a deadline of December 31, 2014, for these minorities to  acquire Indian citizenship. The notification comes as a relief to a large number of people, especially Hindus from Pakistan, who crossed over to India after 2014.

Technology Sector.title: Bengaluru startup Upliance AI launches next-gen smart cooking device priced at Rs 39,999
Technology Sector.summary: Founded in 2021 by IIT Bombay alumni, Upliance AI’s flagship product is a kitchen appliance that has been designed to automate several cooking functions.
